name.full: Teams Conversation Bot with Adaptive Cards

description.short: A Teams bot demonstrating conversation events and adaptive card interactions.
description.full: This Teams bot showcases comprehensive conversation event handling including read receipts, message updates, adaptive cards, and immersive reader support. Perfect for personal chats, group conversations, and team channels. Features include @mentions, welcome messages, and proactive messaging to all conversation members.
